prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon that has a unique color pattern and a small size.
Imagine a Pokemon with a striking blue body and a bold black crest on its head.
Show me a small flying Pokemon that lives in urban areas and has an eye-catching design.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of a common bird and a mythical creature.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies agility and speed, with vibrant colors and distinctive features.
Make a tiny Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and has a playful demeanor.
Give me a unique Pokemon that can blend into its environment with its colorful plumage.
